name: oion
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| word(cdm(c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ Ord(dom(c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| word(cdm(c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ Ord(dom(c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
-| wceq(c2, coi(c3, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))
⊣ c2 = OrdIso(c3, c0)

stmt.origin: 3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cdm(c2), universe))
stmt.pretty: 3syl(c0 ∈ c1, (dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))), c2 ∈ 𝕌, dom(c2)∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cdm(c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c2), universe), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → dom(c2)∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (dom(c2)∈ 𝕌 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| wceq(c2, coi(c3, c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cdm(c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c2), universe), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ c2 = OrdIso(c3, c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → dom(c2)∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (dom(c2)∈ 𝕌 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wceq(c2, coi(c3, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ c2 = OrdIso(c3, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| wceq(c2, coi(c3, c0))
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cdm(c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c2), universe), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ c2 = OrdIso(c3, c0)
⊣ (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → dom(c2)∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (dom(c2)∈ 𝕌 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| wceq(c2, coi(c3, c0))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c2), universe), wb(wcel(cdm(c2), con0), word(cdm(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ c2 = OrdIso(c3, c0)
⊣ (dom(c2)∈ 𝕌 →(dom(c2)∈ On ↔ Ord(dom(c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(c2), con0))
-| wceq(c2, coi(c3, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)∈ On)
⊣ c2 = OrdIso(c3, c0)

comment: The order type of the well-order ` R ` on ` A ` is an ordinal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-May-2015.)
